Package domain.block

Class IfBlock

java.lang.Object
domain.block.Block
domain.block.SequenceBlock
domain.block.SurroundingBlock
domain.block.SingleSurroundingBlock
domain.block.IfBlock
class IfBlock
extends SingleSurroundingBlock
An class of IfBlocks that extends SingleSurroundingBlock. It has a specified execution and a name.
Version:
4.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael
